item.title: Music Industry Moves: Empire Launches in Nordic Region; Taps Iman Hazheer as Territory Manager
item.description: Empire has announced their expansion into the Nordic region with a brand new hire, Iman Hazheer, as territory manager. In this newly established role, Hazheer will lead Empire’s strategic initiatives
